* private void emptyLoop() {

timeline.author: esilkensen

timeline.body: This comment should be on the line where violation occurred. Please fix all below cases as well.
timeline.bodyText: This comment should be on the line where violation occurred. Please fix all below cases as well.
timeline.bodyHTML: This comment should be on the line where violation occurred. Please fix all below cases as well.
timeline.author: rdiachenko

timeline.bodyHTML:
/var/tmp/checkstyle $ cat Test.java 
public class Test {
  private void emptyLoop() {
    for (int i = 0; i < 10; i++) {
      // ignored
    }

    try {
      // violation
    } catch (Exception e) {
      // ignored
    }
  }
}

/var/tmp/checkstyle $ cat config.xml 
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE module PUBLIC
          "-//Checkstyle//DTD Checkstyle Configuration 1.3//EN"
          "https://checkstyle.org/dtds/configuration_1_3.dtd">
<module name="Checker">
    <module name="TreeWalker">
       <module name="EmptyBlock">
         <property name="option" value="text"/>
         <property name="tokens" value="LITERAL_TRY"/>
       </module>
    </module>
</module>

/var/tmp/checkstyle $ java -jar checkstyle-8.30-all.jar -c config.xml Test.java 
Starting audit...
Audit done.

In your example you say there is a violation but it is not true.
timeline.author: rdiachenko
